channel.title: [PI]317 adding prayer. changing login box ect, adding music, weird login glitch
channel.description:
Ok well im using the mtpv2 and the client anyways.
i was going through the prayers and i noticed it has all the new prayer and leaches and stuff but when i look at my prayer tab it just shows all the normal prayer then chivarly and piety. but onec i get 95 prayer the piety changes to turmoil. my question is.
how do i make it so the whole prayer thing looks like turmoil.
- CHANGING LOGIN BOX - - ok so i need to know were i can locate the picture of wat i edit. cuz right now its just a normal runescape login screen with the fires ect.
- also there is music on it but it doesnt play so how would i go on about adding music
- ok so if i fail logging in and i kinda spam a bit the login. it says no response of server. if i have wrong pass and try logging in a couple times. how can i make nto say that just say invalid password.

item.title: [PI]317 adding prayer. changing login box ect, adding music, weird login glitch
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

All the sprites you are talking about are done in the clients ‘cache’,

Use Tom’s cache suite(editor), check image/jagex archives out.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]317 adding prayer. changing login box ect, adding music, weird login glitch
